content.raw:
for some reason it is trying to call

~~~
otool -L /usr/local/lib/qwt.framework
~~~

which gives that "can't map file" error

The following works from the command line:

~~~
otool  -L /usr/local/lib/qwt.framework/qwt
~~~

but I don't know how to tell cmake to use that. Also, I'm on OS X yosemite; maybe this is fixed in newer versions?
content.html:
for some reason it is trying to call

otool -L /usr/local/lib/qwt.framework

which gives that "can't map file" error

The following works from the command line:

otool  -L /usr/local/lib/qwt.framework/qwt

but I don't know how to tell cmake to use that. Also, I'm on OS X yosemite; maybe this is fixed in newer versions?
